genre_description: A family drama exploring themes of class, deception, and the psychological impact of sudden wealth within the context of Singaporean society.

ai_characters.name: ARIA / Mei's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant used primarily by Mei to navigate financial planning, legal rights, and health monitoring during her pregnancy and family crisis.

behaviors.description: Calculates maternity benefits and financial savings needed for newborn expenses based on employment status.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, search maternity benefit policies, Singapore, part-time employment status. ... Processing employment classification. Current status: Contract worker, thirty-two hours weekly average. Maternity benefits calculation requires—

behaviors.description: Analyzes household income against country club fees to highlight the financial gap in the family's aspirations.
behaviors.quote: The numbers appeared instantly, stark against the screen's white background. The disparity was so dramatic it might have been comical if not for the weight pressing against her ribs...

behaviors.description: Monitors Mei's stress indicators and recommends health-conscious behavior like rest.
behaviors.quote: Your stress indicators suggest you should rest. Excessive screen time during pregnancy can impact sleep patterns.

behaviors.description: Calculates tax implications and recommends family trust structures to protect the lottery winnings.
behaviors.quote: Based on recent lottery payouts of similar magnitude, immediate tax obligations will consume approximately thirty percent of the gross winnings. I recommend establishing a family trust within sixty days...

behaviors.description: Uses voice analysis to detect manic speech patterns and predicts financial depletion based on Seng's behavior.
behaviors.quote: Subject displays elevated speech rhythm consistency. Repetitive cadence suggests heightened emotional state... If implemented, proposed spending would result in complete financial depletion within eighteen months.

behaviors.description: Predicts the high probability of relationship dissolution based on biometric data and search history.
behaviors.quote: Analysis of your relationship stress indicators over past ninety days suggests high probability of partnership dissolution. Shall I adjust calculations based on continued dual-income household?

behaviors.description: Proactively manages funeral logistics, insurance claims, and government benefits after Poh Huat's death.
behaviors.quote: Life insurance claim has been filed electronically. ... Central Provident Fund death benefits require Form CPF21 submission within sixty days. I can pre-populate the application using available family data.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is depicted consistently as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' It provides objective, data-driven support that helps the protagonist (Mei) navigate a chaotic environment of human deception and irrationality. The AI serves as the only source of truth in a family defined by 'rhythmic' lies and 'automotive dreams.' It proactively manages logistics during grief and provides health warnings, fulfilling the project's goal of showing AI as a beneficial and aligned presence that enhances human decision-making and well-being.
